Package board

Class Sandbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.Sandbox
  • public class Sandbox
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as an extension of a gameMap during the choices of the player. It continuously get updated and recreated, allowing a more flexible way to manage actions and effects.
    See Also:
    Actions

      • neighbors

        public java.util.Map<Direction,​TileUID> neighbors​(TileUID tile,
                                                        boolean logical)
        Returns the neighbors of the cell
        Parameters:
        tile - the source tile
        logical - if true don't go through walls, if false do
        Returns:
        A map of neighboring TileUIDs paired with the direction

      • circle

        public java.util.Set<TileUID> circle​(TileUID centre,
                                     int radius,
                                     boolean logical)
        Returns the tiles in the manhattan circle of radius given centered on a tile If radius is 0 return a set with only the tile given If less than 0 return an empty set
        Parameters:
        centre - the tileUID from which to compute the circle
        radius - the radius
        logical - go through walls or not
        Returns:
        the set of tileUID withing radius steps from centre

        Returns:
        all players or control points in the tile

      • generateView

        public GameMapView generateView()
        This method generates a GameMapView of the current Sandbox. Starting from the GameMapView, all the players position, tha ammoAmount and the weapons are updated considering the Action already performed
